title: Benihana has 24/7 compliance hotline with phone numbers
statement: Benihana's compliance hotline operates 24/7 at (844) 260-0002 for English and (800) 216-1288 for Spanish speakers.

citations.quote: The third party service provider may be reached 24 hours a day, 7 days a week at (844) 260-0002 for English speaking USA and Canada, or (800) 216-1288 for Spanish speaking North America
